question: What is emphasized about Gradio's user interface?
response: Gradio simplifies the creation and hosting of interactive demos for machine learning models by providing a user-friendly interface for building demos quickly. Also, hf.space offers free hosting for Gradio demos, making it easy to share your work. Gradio can be installed using `conda install gradio`, and further details and examples can be found at [https://bit.ly/34wESgd](https://bit.ly/34wESgd).
